name: Angustura vera
Relationship: Compare: NUX; RUTA; MERCUR.; BRUCEA. Bark of Nux vomica or angustura falsa. (Tetanic spasms with undisturbed consciousness, worse noise liquids, paralyzed lower extremities, worse least touch, CRIES FOR FEAR OF BEING TOUCHED. Painful jerking of legs; cramp-like pain in knees; rigid and lame limbs of paralytics. For pain in the passing of calculus.)

Head: Oversensitive
Headache, with heat of face
Acute pain in cheeks
Drawing in facial muscles
Pain in temporal muscles, when opening the jaws
Pain in articulation of jaw, in masseter muscles, as if fatigued by chewing too much
Cramp-pain on the zygomatic arch
Abdomen: Tenesmus with soft stool; chronic diarrhoea, with debility and loss of flesh
Back: Pain in spine, at nape of neck and sacrum, worse on pressure
Skin: Caries, very painful ulcers which affect the bone
Extremities: Stiffness and tension of muscles and joints

details: Rheumatic and paralytic complaints - great difficulty in walking. Crackling in all joints.The greatest craving for coffee is a characteristic symptom. Caries of long bones. Paralysis. Tetanus. Stiffness of muscles and joints. OVERSENSITIVE.Principal action on spinal motor nerves and mucous membranes.
